slide.title: Engineer and captain Dalilur Rahman with his vessel that carries salt to Jhalakathi from Kutubdia., Photo: Andrew Eagle
Jhalakathi salt has a long history., Photo: Andrew Eagle
Chinese graves are traditionally aligned in accordance with feng shui principles. Photo: Andrew Eagle
Jhalakathi, built on trade. Photo: Andrew Eagle
Easy access to the river and the sea encouraged the salt mills to congregate in Jhalakathi. Photo: Andrew Eagle
